title: Yukemuri Biyori♥Koi Meguri
original_name: 湯けむりびより ♥ 恋めぐり
sinopse:
Following in his mother's footsteps, Wataru became the onsen ryokan's male "hostess." Minato's love confession "I love Wataru!" has given the inn the reputation of Best Treatment for Love Relationships! Will Wataru, who is still learning his profession, react well to this passionate love attack?

(Source: Liquid Passion)
